entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (ep3_myyydril_guard.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_456: [The guards look sternly at you.] You shouldn't be wandering aimlessly down here. It's dangerous.
entries.s_460: [The guard looks you over.] I suppose... Is there anything I can help you with?
entries.s_464: The Urnsor'is are vile creatures feasting on the souls of the living. It is imperative that you keep away from these creatures. We have lost many strong Myyydril to these.. things. Don't go toying with them. If you're curious, they're in the Deep Depths. [The guard shrugs.]
entries.s_472: If you continue to travel downward, you won't be able to miss it. Just beyond the Myyydril Village is the entrance to the Deep Depths. You should be careful.
entries.s_478: I'm going to go explore now.
entries.s_480: Keep your wits about you, my friend.
